item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
item.description: "Wouldn’t you rather play chess, Ma’am?....It’s less destructive of clothes." -- Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
item.description: "Never sleep with a lady only once, especially in the case of an older lady. -'Rhett " -- Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
item.description: "<i>Rhett:</i> Here’s the problem. I am not the sexual equivalent of an espresso machine. " -- Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Sun Tzu
item.description: "Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win" -- Sun Tzu

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
item.description: "<i>Rhett:</i> If you've made up your mind to impale someone, do it with conviction." -- Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
item.description: "Carpe Scrotum. Seize life by the testicles" -- Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
item.description: "Never ask a question if you don’t know the answer." -- Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rhett, Knight’s Fork by Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
item.description: "Having sex multiple times on the first sleepover does not count as more than one “date”…" -- Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rhett, Knight’s Fork by Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
item.description:
"If you neglected to warn Djetth beforehand that you were going to shoot him down, Your Highness, he may consider you in breach of contract...
<i>-- Rhett</i>" -- Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Stanisŀaw Jerzy Lec
item.description: "No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible." -- Stanisŀaw Jerzy Lec

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
item.description: "As a rule of thumb, it was always safer if the Commander-in-Chief formulated a risky plan." -- Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Rowena Cherry
item.description: "Never ask a question if you don’t know the answer. — Rhett" -- Rowena Cherry

item.title: Rowena add a quote by Benjamin Disraeli
item.description: "When I want to read a novel, I write one." -- Benjamin Disraeli
